item.title: Russia launches more than 100 drones at Ukraine in New Year’s attack, Kyiv says
item.description: At least six people were injured in Kyiv as Russia launched a drone strike on the capital in the early hours of Wednesday, city officials said.

item.title: New Year's Eve 2025: Watch countries ring in the year
item.description: The Pacific island nation of Kiribati was the first country to ring in 2025, its 133,500 citizens celebrating the new year at 5 a.m. ET on Tuesday.

item.title: How Jimmy Carter remained 'Mr. Jimmy' to the people of his hometown
item.description: Atlanta Journal-Constitution reporter Ernie Suggs talks about the life and work of former President Jimmy Carter, who died Sunday at the age of 100.

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s enduring diplomatic legacy: ANALYSIS
item.description: The impact of his single-term foreign policy is still felt around the globe.

item.title: Republicans raising questions about Johnson's reelection as House speaker
item.description: Republican Rep. Chip Roy said Tuesday that he doesn’t think House Speaker Mike Johnson has the necessary votes to remain speaker in Friday's leadershi...
